name: Just Dice & Beats
description:
Made in 24 hours for the GMTK game jame 2022.

Controlls:
WASD - move
SPACE - dash (does not make you invincible)

Dodge the rolling dice and try to survive for 2 minutes!
WARNING: this is a hard game, but it is possible to win.
Feel free to post your records in the comments!

Made in Unity
